title: Fastest First Freshener Goat Birth EVER Filmed!

tasks.task: Assisting in the birth and caring for newborn goats during labor.
subtasks: Preparing materials for assistance (e.g., puppy pads, towels).
Observing the labor process and identifying progress (looking for a nose, noting presentation of hooves).
Monitoring the mother's contractions and encouraging natural delivery.
Assisting with the delivery of multiple babies (cleaning airways, helping the firstborn, allowing natural birth of subsequent offspring).
Ensuring proper neonatal care (cleaning, feeding, and encouraging breastfeeding).
Addressing the mother's discomfort and anxiety (coaxing her to tend to her offspring).
Providing supplemental feeding if necessary to ensure the newborns begin lactation.
Identifying individual babies (e.g., referring to them as boy and girl).
Ensuring the newborns have access to milk when the mother is preoccupied (bribing with food, hand-feeding if needed).

tasks.task: Assisting in the birth and caring for newborn goats during labor.**
